public class ReverseLOGIC {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

for(int i=0;i<=3;i++){
			
			System.out.println(" ");
			
			
			for(int j=3;j>=i;j--) {
				
				System.out.print(" row    = "+i);
				
				System.out.print(" column = "+j);
				
			}
			
			
			
		}
		
		
		
	}

}
